Class MessageArea

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.awt.event.TextListener
public class MessageArea
extends java.awt.TextArea
implements java.awt.event.KeyListener, java.awt.event.TextListener

Simple TextArea that always scrolls to the bottom. Also creates an out and err PrintWriter so that you can redirect stdout/stderr to these streams, using the System.setOut/setErr methods.

See Also:

simple TextArea that always scrolls to the bottom. Also creates an out and err PrintWriter so that you can redirect stdout/stderr to these streams, using the System.setOut/setErr methods.
